Package org.bukkit.inventory

Interface RecipeChoice

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.function.Predicate<ItemStack>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipeChoice.ExactChoice, RecipeChoice.MaterialChoice
public interface RecipeChoice
extends java.util.function.Predicate<ItemStack>, java.lang.Cloneable
Represents a potential item match within a recipe. All choices within a recipe must be satisfied for it to be craftable. This class is not legal for implementation by plugins!

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  RecipeChoice.ExactChoice
    Represents a choice that will be valid only one of the stacks is exactly matched (aside from stack size).
    static class  RecipeChoice.MaterialChoice
    Represents a choice of multiple matching Materials.
